name: Ping pong (*crazy)
description:
This is a game I decided to make under 24 hours of working on it.

Every 15 seconds the ball enter in Crazy mod, and its center of mass is moved by a random number between -0,75 and 0,75 ( on the x and y axis). After 5 seconds the ball returns to normal and the timer restart.

Every 10 seconds the ball is "kicked" in a random direction.

P.S.: It's recommended full screen to play the game.
